Company: Richards-Warren
Role: Application Support Reporting Specialist

At Richards-Warren, we're committed to fostering a culture of inclusivity and diversity. As an equal opportunities employer, we're dedicated to creating a workplace that celebrates individual differences and promotes equal opportunities for all.

Job Description:
We're seeking an Application Support Reporting Specialist to join our team. As an Application Support Reporting Specialist, you will be responsible for providing technical support, resolving issues, and generating reports to drive business insights. Your expertise in application support and reporting will help us optimize our systems and improve our customer experience.

Responsibilities:

 Provide technical support to internal stakeholders, resolving issues and troubleshooting problems
 Generate reports to drive business insights and inform data-driven decisions
 Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify areas for improvement and implement process enhancements
 Develop and maintain technical documentation to ensure knowledge sharing and continuity

Qualifications and Experience:

 2+ years of experience in application support and reporting
 Proficiency in reporting tools and data analysis
 Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail
 Excellent communication and collaboration skills

Perks and Benefits:
We offer a competitive salary, ranging from $60,000 to $80,000 USD per year, based on your experience and skills. You'll also receive a comprehensive benefits package, including medical, dental, and vision insurance, as well as a 401(k) matching program. Additionally, you'll have access to ongoing training and development opportunities to help you grow in your career.

At Richards-Warren, we're committed to creating a workplace that values diversity and promotes equal opportunities for all. Help us achieve our diversity objectives by applying – we are interested in candidates with disabilities.
